content.detailedDescription: After planting some germinated morning glory seeds, i went out to the pipeline behind my house to smoke a cigarette. it was 4:00. i looked up at the sky where i saw yesterday's (6/18/2010) two ufos, not expecting to see anything but still curious. to my amazement, i saw a black sphere flying under the clouds. i watched it for a minute until it made it's way to the blue sky. once it reached the edge of the cloud, it vanished as if it could only be seen under a cloud. it flew in the same direction as my june 18th sightings, north east, though lower in altitude.
content.summary: Black sphere flying under clouds vanished once it hit the blue sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was just on my lunch break from work when i witnessed an object in the sky over riverside, ca that i have no explanation for.

as i sometimes do, i parked my vehicle on a hill here in grand terrace that overlooks the railroad line that runs from riverside to colton. as most of you already know, i am a huge train geek, and during my lunch i sometimes either walk to this vantage point, or dive, so that i can watch trains go by while i eat.

at about 1:30 pm pst i took my normal position on top of the hill and began to eat my lunch. while i was sitting there thinking about some of my recent interactions with fans and fellow authors about the now controversial dvd release of "destroy all planets", i noticed a silver metallic object in the sky traveling from east to west.

as the object passed by, i noticed that it seemed to reflect the sunlight and i didn't notice any wings. i thought that this was an odd angle to view an airplane, which is what i assumed it was. i also noted that i hadn't ever seen a plane at this low altitude in this area of the sky before. upon further investigation, i also noticed that this, 'plane', didn't seem to have a tail fin. it looked about the same size a commercial jet, oval in shape, larger in the front tapering towards the tail.

as the object traveled to about 3/4 of the way across my point of view it simply vanished. now when i say vanished, i mean it disappeared, slowly, like someone turned it off.

i sat in place for another ten minutes surveying the sky for the object and could not locate it anywhere in the heavens.

the sky is bit hazy today, but there are no clouds, or anything else for that matter, for this object to have flown into. it just disappeared right in front of my eyes.

in my estimation, the objects flight path would have been directly over riverside.
content.summary: At about 1:30 pm pst i took my normal position on top of the hill and began to eat my lunch. i noticed a silver metallic object in the sky traveling from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
2 nights i have seen a strange object on the sky, i was so lucky to have a video cam, so have the whole sightin on cam a total recorded time is for both nights about 30-35 minutes,
this is very difficult to explain, but i have knowledge of air traffic rules, and avionics i have been studying jar-ppl so have big interest in avionics.
what i saw on the sky was a bright circle/square pulsating i have a 70x zoom on the cam, and when i zoomed in on the object and looked at the video on my computer, i was shocked, first i thought it could be a satellite or something, but the video when seeing it again and in full screen reveals a strannge object doing manouvers thats not possible for any type of known aircraft, it was complete silent estimated 3-400 meters obove sea level,don't know what it is, but very strange !!
i was sitting in my living room, when i noticed the object raises above the tree about 2 miles away, what got my interest was the way the object was moving and how bright it was,  if any specialist want to see the video please feel free to contact me at torbenfoxy@hotmail.Com

the videos are in hd quality so they are big, and i'm not sure how to make them smaller, so when i find out i will post them
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other
content.summary: Bright object hovering over our forest.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gotten new glasses that day and was sitting out on my deck and my wife was out in the yard with our dogs and enjoying the evening.  i looked up and watching the stars when an especially bright star moved in a zigzag pattern.  thinking it way my eyes playing tricks on me, i called to my wife and had her watch the same star.  she verified that it was indeed moving in a very erratic pattern.  we continued to watch and this object would move rapidly in a northerly direction, stop, make a 90 degree turn and speed away, only to stop, then move at a very rapid rate again.  it raced across the sky then perform a v pattern, then it would stop and be stationary for a few minutes then start the erratic movements again.  this object started at about 70 degrees off the horizon and continued to rise during the time watched.  i watched this off and on until 4:00 am at which time it had climbed to being approximately 95 degrees off the horizon.

i contacted friends here in the area who also watched this object for a time and saw the same thing i did.  i also have a friend who lives approximately 200 miles to the east of me who is also a night owl and i contacted her via facebook and told her what i was seeing.  at that time she went outside and saw the same object at the very same position in the sky and performing just as i described to her.

i notified the police, who sent an officer to my address.  he observed the object and it's movement.

i am 62 years old and have never witnessed anything like this in my life, but rest assured i will be watching the skies more closely from this point forward. i do not have any video nor pictures of this incident as nothing i own for a camera is unable to take pictures in the dark.  i do know what i saw and swear this to be true.

the last time i saw the object was at approximately 4:00 am just prior to going to bed..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was high enough it looked like a bright star.

content.detailedDescription:
I guess i was about 22 years old at the time. my friend and i were standing in a field/pasture behind my dad's old house and property in san leon. it was in the early evening and it was already dark outside. we were checking out a telescope, some binoculars and also shooting a bb gun. just screwing around. 

suddenly, in the near sky (maybe a 1/4 away, 45 deg angle up), something lit up the night and streaked off out of site/disappeared toward the south, towards galveston bay. it was silent and we could feel the brightness on our faces. there were no clouds in the sky that night. i remember waiting to hear a jet sound but nothing came. no sound. i did not see the shape of an object, only a flash and then a streak in the southerly direction, then nothing as it was gone. immediately/next thing we knew we were running away, scared. however, we calmed down about 50 yards later and then just walked back to the house.

the area is somewhat rural with large pastures and an old electric plant nearby. lots of open space, dotted with a few streets and mobile homes, houses, cattle, horses, whatever people have out there.

that's all i can remember. the entire sighting lasted 1 or 2 seconds. i did not have any missing time or anything like that. not abducted, etc. this was simply an unidentified flying object. it was not a jet, ball lightning, a prop plane, balloon, helicopter, etc. 

i have tried to be skeptical about what it could have been, but have never seen anything like that before. i have lived around airports and busy skies my entire life. it does not make sense.

i don't really have anything else to lend on this sighting.
content.summary: In the near sky as we stood in a pasture, sky lit up and an object took off to the south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hoeing in the garden when this sound came from the sky to the west but high. at first it sounded as if it was a jet engine possibly in distress. so i tried to find it. it was a wobbly heavy vibrating sound that incereased until as it was straight overheaed it got so loud it was as if my head was in a metal five gallon bucket and there were huge sterio speakers either side making the noise. that is how loud and how echoy and uncomfortable it was. my head and ears were actually vibrating very hard to it. you could feel it in the ground through your feet and in your body. i tried to cover the sun with one then both hands but still could not see the source at all. the dog vanished that had been there a moment ago. he was under the barbque when i went in. as it moved to the east souteast it waned till it was finally gone. there were no trails in the sky. the whole episode only lasted for about twenty seconds or less. it was really odd and extreamly loud. whatever was making that noise was fast and hummed with a warble. the actual sound was like standing beside a huge machine that was vibrating ready to explode!
i came in and got on the laptop right away to do this report, and as i sit here now my ears are ringing.
 i asked my wife who has far better hearing that me if she heard it. she was sitting in the farmhouse watching tv and did not hear a thing.
content.summary: Sound only!

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio watching a plane when i noticed lights about the size of stars that appeared to be flying around the sun.  i contacted a fi and relayed the info. i have been randomly been taking pictures of the sky and have discovered an anomoly. i dont know if it's related to the event that is taking place right now but i thought i'd submit it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Anomaly in photo related to present in sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friend on the hill over tuzla,it is a rest place and lots of people wisit it,i was taking some snap photos with my camera and sadenly out from nowhere we saw a flash,and then apeard in the left angle a disc shaped object it stayd there for aproximetly 15 sec. and then it fly away in a amazing speed southeast of our pozition...Ofcourse i have taken a picture of that flaying soucer to confirm my story.Heare in bosnia it is not unusuall sighting ,however lots of people heare are sceptics and it is a shame.....
content.summary: The ufo over bosnian city tuzla.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30 edt a lafayatte witness called to say she was seeing spheres streaming towards sun. wife went outside and used building to block direct sun disk but could see the spheres streaming towards sun mostly from west towards sun. one instance there was one that split into two. other times there were handfuls streaming to sun all at once. this sighting is still ongoing with other witnesses from kokomo, peru, lafayette, and indianapolis all reporting same occurence. pictures will be uploaded for this case later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mass sighting in progress 10:30-noon edt small spheres streaming towards sun.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second time i have seen the same ufos.  the first time was in late may.  both events happened on a sunday around 11:30 am.  i was getting in my car to take my brother to work when i saw a bright object in the sky.  since this was my second event i immediately stopped and looked and knew what i was looking at.  i yelled for my brother and he came to see.  he also saw the object.  after a few minutes of it moving around in the sky we lost track of it.  so we got in the car and started to drive when within 10 seconds i looked up and saw a group of weird objects (that looked exactly like the ones i saw in may) and said "what are those?" i almost instantly pull the car over and get out.  my brother and i both get out and stare at them flying overhead.  they seemed to be high up but it was hard to tell.  as they moved they were moving around each other in a very elegant way.  then as they moved on further they started doing formations.  one was a perfect "z" shape formation.  from that they went into a perfect line and moved off out of our view.  the ufos that were in a cluster were not bright like the first object i saw, but had kind of a darker color to them and the air around them looked distorted somehow.  though from there movements and such, to me it seems like the bright object i saw is the same as the cluster of objects i saw.  
     my dad was in the air force and i have been around aviation my entire life. i do look up in the sky a lot.  i have flown on airplanes since i was a kid and have been to many many airports.  i know how to eliminate the possibilities.  i know what i saw is unexplainable and is quite obvious a secret on the highest level.  it was either humans in the craft or some other species.  anyway you look at it the lies are going so deep that it does affect to the core every man woman and child on this planet.  i like to go with my gut, and my gut is telling me that if humans were in these craft then we wouldn't be seeing them because they would want to keep it secret and deny that they even exist.
content.summary: I was getting ready to take my brother to work and was putting my daughter in the car.  i saw a bright object in the sky.  a few minutes later my brother came outside and thats when we both saw a cluster of about 10 ufos doing many different formations.

content.detailedDescription: Was just driving from texas to arozona this showed up on horizion loading off iphone if pics don't come out contact me i'll send. can't load file on iphone contact me for pics
content.summary: Object moving slowly across highway from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house watching tv,and my mother called me outside.She was taking the dog out,and saw something odd in the sky.I went out there and we saw what seemed to be a triangular shape object.At first we thought it was an airplane,untill we saw that it had 3 white lights on the bottom,in the shape of a triangle also.It seemed to also have a small red light in the front,that blinked.It also would go to the right slightly,then go back to a straight path.Then it would go to the left,and go back into a straight path again. it only did that once for each direction though.I believe this was a ufo,cause it made no noise,and seeemed to just hover across the sky. i have seen ufo's before,and this seemed to be similar to my other acounts aswell.
content.summary: Clear skies around 10-11 pm.

content.detailedDescription: On january 4, 2000 at about 11 pm, my dad and i were heading to vincennes for a boy scout meeting. as we were driving on highway 41 northbound, we could see a bright white light in the distance over the highway. as we got closer, we could begin to see a triangular shape to it. the sky was cloudy and it was nighttime, so the lights from vincennes were shinning up onto the clouds and made them look tan-brown, but the ufo was about a mile south of vincennes, and we were able to clearly see an actual triangular shape, it appeared to be either black or dark grey. the rear had 3 very bright white lights flashing from left to right and a panel of dimmer white lights that were pulsating on and off. we could see a white light at each of the 3 corners and a red flashing light more towards the rear not exactly in the center. the sides had, what i took, were circular windows with a bright white light inside the craft. when we drove direcly beneath it, there was no sound that we could hear, and definetely no thrust at all. i've been to over 10 airshows in my life, and have witnessed the vertical take off and landing "harrier" which is very loud. we got to where we were going ( i do not remember exactly where) and we got out of the car, and we saw the object move very slowly over us (around 15 or 20 mph) and was about 500 feet in the air, then it banked to the right, stopped, and then accelerated off to the northwest at over 100 mph, and disappeared behind the trees and off into illinois, without making a sound. i assume this was most likely the same object seen over southern illinois early on january 5, 2000.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering over highway.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home one evening and thought i would step outside to check and see if everything was okay, i've seen a number of these triangles so i am pretty paranoid but curious. i looked to the east and saw what looked like a star low in the sky, it appeared to change colors from orange to red, and was slow moving. there were commercial jets in the area, but none of them could be seen unless they had blinking lights. i went inside and got our telescope and and camera tried to observe it the best i could. i could see two white lights (not flashing) on the front end of it, and a blue light (not flashing) on the corners (not the front corner) and a white flashing light on the bottom towards the rear, as it past, i estimated it to be travelling at around 50 mph and at an altitude of 500 feet. it made no sound whatsoever. the rear had yellow-gold pulsating lights. the object looked triangular, and i estimated it to be about half the size of a football field, its motion was from east-northeast to west-southwest. i attempted to take a picture of it but the object did not show up in the photo. i did get a little nervous, but like i said, i have seen these things before, this is the 6th time, so i was'nt scared. i lost sight of the object as it went behind a ridge with trees.
content.summary: Blue and white and gold lights (some flashing) in triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened in 1969 when i was 16 years old. i was living in the southeast side of houston, texas. the nights were much darker back then and the city lights were not as much of an issue as they are now. i have always been interested in ufo's and our family would spend many hours looking for satellites on clear nights. i am not sure of the date when this occurred but i think that it was in the early fall. i was in my front yard just looking around trying to find a satellite when i noticed one coming up from the northern horizon. it was moving at a constant rate and was about as bright as a bright star. i thought it was cool and continued watching it. to my surprise, when it was directly above me, it stopped. i tried to continue watching it but my neck finally got tired and i looked away. it was so clear that night that when i looked back up i wasn't sure exactly which star it was. at this time, a friend of mine who lived across the street from me came over to visit. i told him what i had seen and he became very interested and decided to hang out with me. we continued watching around the sky looking for anything else. we occasionally looked up to see if the one that stopped was still there. the next thing that we saw came up from the opposite horizon about 30 minutes after the first one and it could have actually been a satellite since it passed directly overhead and continued until we could no longer see it. it looked identical to the first one. then the big event occurred. about 45 minutes to an hour after the second satellite disappeared and from the same spot that it disappeared from, we saw four of them come up from the horizon. they were all exactly the same size and brightness. while they were moving toward the sky directly above us, they were doing tricks like flying circles around each other, they would fly apart and then zoom back together, one or two would stop and let the others go ahead and then they would instantly catch up with them. the next thing that happened let us know that the first one that i had seen a couple of hours ago was actually still there. as the group of four reached the sky directly above us, a fifth one joined them and moved off with them. it was like they were picking the first one up on the way somewhere. all five of them were kind of playing around as they flew off and finally disappeared. i have always wished that i had a telescope back then so that i might have been able to focus in on the one that was directly above me for a couple of hours. i am not sure what they were doing but i have always thought that they had been stationed around the country or earth at the locations of big cities to observe. although i have never had anything like this happen again, i have seen many satellites over the years. at least i think that they were satellites.

thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Single to multiple sightings

content.detailedDescription: Inside my car heading nnw on flatbush avenue towards kings plaza near avenue v. approximately 10 a.M. on june 17, 2010. partly cloudy day. inside of a cloud mass, a unmoving horizontal approximately 200 foot long ribbon of shimmering gold, silver, purple appeared for 2 seconds then vanished. i noticed it because it was the cloud mass in my line of sight. i immediately thought it was a ufo because nothing shimmers like that then vanishes instantly. i felt calm and delighted that i got to see it, yet disappointed that it vanished so soon. i did laugh because it's as if once i registered it, it vanished.
content.summary: Horizontal ribbon of shimmering gold, silver, purple.

content.detailedDescription: At 6:00 am this morning i went into the garden of my house to look at the winter sky that at this time of year in brazil is always very nice. the sky was still a little dark and many stars could be observed when a small circular ball of yellow light caught my attention. first i thought it could be the beacon of an airplane, but the lack of noise typical of an aircraft and the path that the light was always straight with small but sudden movements to the sides made it clear to me that it could not be a plane. the object followed their path in the sky in absolute silence at a height of approximately 200 meters to go away from my field of vision. i observed it for about 7 minutes
content.summary: Circular light ball. strong soft white yellow light emanating from it.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were sitting around the firepit of my family's cabin, facing east. the sun had just gone down and the stars began to appear. i had been watching the sky all week, hoping to see the stars without major light pollution. i noticed, and pointed out to my sister, a very bright light slowly travelling north, maybe 2000 ft agl. me being an aircraft mechanic and student pilot, was very puzzled. why aren't are there any nav lights or a rotating beacon? absolutely no sound what so ever. while explaining to my sister what we should be seeing (red and white nav lights, a rotating beacon and possibly strobes) the light turned east and flew away from us disappearing amongst the treetops. the intensity of the light never diminished, even when clearly flying away from us. my sister and i talked about what we had just witnessed. minutes later i was able to show her 2 examples of what we should have seen. an aircraft travelling south-southwest rumbled past overhead.. we could clearly see all three nav lights and hear the drone of the prop. even as it flew past we were able to see and hear a jet at altitude. we could clearly see the contrails and nav lights in the twilight. 

the next night my mom and my son accompanied me around the fire. i was explaining to my mom what my sister and i had seen the night before. again i was able to show her an airplane flying across the night sky. showing her the correct lights and sounds. almost immediately we observed an indentical bright light travelling the same directions(north gently turning east)fly past. the light took the same flight path as the night before. no extra lights and no sound, just an intense light clearly under intelligent control. i reached for my digital camera and set it to movie mode, of course the batteries were dead from the numerous picture i had taken on vacation. oh well.. we know what we saw!!
content.summary: Bright white light makes a right turn.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my two children and one of my daughter's friends were heading down lincoln highway toward cairo.  i noticed a very large bright object in the sky straight ahead of us past cairo toward beaverdam.  it was about as high in the sky as the bright planet behind us at the time (not sure which planet it was, i am guessing venus?).  i said "whoa, what is that?"  my 9-year-old and her 10-year-old friend both noticed it as well.  my 6-year-old wasn't sure what we were talking about.  i stopped the vehicle in the road since there was no traffic to see if there was any movement, thinking it was possible it was an airplane with a lot of lights on it.  it wasn't moving at all, and i said "what are those lights?"  my daughter said "they look like they are moving around it" and then it just disappeared completely.  i said "where did it go??"  there was no cloud cover at all, all of the stars that were there were still there up above where it had been.  it never moved or anything, it was as if someone turned off a switch and it was a light bulb.
content.summary: Bright white light with other lights around it

content.detailedDescription:
Empez��� el perro a ladrar, impaciente se mostraba, eran las 9:05pm y empez��� a correr viento, hab���a nubes grises y entre espacios se vio una flota de ovnis pasar con una trayectoria de 12 a 6 en punto. se despejo el cielo y segu���a corriendo el viento. unos peque���os relampagos en los puntos 12 y 6. aproximadamente iban pasando como 50. las flotas fueron como en dos sesiones. en forma circular, giraban los ovnis de luz circular. en el punto 6 empez��� a verse una luz, cual no se v���a por una nube. parec���a ser la luna, de repente fue saliendo de la nube  y aparecio una luz tipo estrella de mayor dimensi���n cual iba bajando poco a poco. las flotas de naves iban hacia esa direcci���n, algunas se quedaban apradas y otras pasaban sobre ellas y despues continuaban su direcci���n. la luz tipo estrella desaparecio. el cielo permaneci��� totalmente descubierto y no habia rastro de esa luz. las flotas de ovnis contiuaban apareciendo y volvio aparecer la luz tipo estrella, dur��� poco esta vez... fue la ultima vez que se vio.

las flotas de naves desaparecieron.

los ovnis de luz circular, como medianoche,ya iban en sentido contrario ahora de 6 a 12,3 en un costado y otra volaba mas bajo pero del otro lado.

no hubo videos o fotos no se aprecia.

un dato curioso, aparecio hacia mi posici���n un objeto peque���o tipo medusa, opaco, girando comomocimiento ondular.
content.summary: Una flota de ovnis de  forma estrella, aprox 40, en trayectoria de circulo viajan 6 ovnis aquellos que tiene luz circular e iban hacia la dirección donde aparecia una estrella demasiado grande, aparecia y desaparecia cual iba bajando.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband just called me on the phone because he heard that someone else reported what we saw on wrightsville beach last tuesday night.  we were both shocked--and i wanted to offer our support to collaborate the description that i just read online of the incident.

my husband and i were staying at cordgrass bay on wrightsville beach with other family members.  after our kids went to bed (sometime after 9), we went for a walk on the beach.  we headed south, toward the pier.  we were about halfway to the pier when some very strange lights appeared out over the ocean.  a red light would go very fast (i mean really fast) horizontally over the ocean, and then just dissappear.  there was a group of some other people also walking on the beach in the surf, and they also stopped and watched the light.  after a while, my husband and i said maybe it was military, so we kept walking.  but the strangest lights happened about ten minutes later.  a red light shot across the sky, divided into multiple lights that went really fast and abruptly stopped in the air and hovered in a formation.  they they abruptly disappeard.  it was very, very strange.  i have never seen anything like it.

we also saw the two fighter jets about 10-15 minutes later.  we just assumed that the lights had something to do with them, but again, the lights did not act like normal missiles.  i don't know how to explain them.
content.summary: Red lights that moved quickly into row formation off wrightsville beach.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1975, the music group abba daybued, singing their hit song "take a chance on me." they presented themselves as a religious group that worshipped aliens. i believe the music group was from switzerland or sweden. the alien species was also called abba. this religious cult, however, was based in germany. they claimed that all you had to do was have your television on and call their name three times (abba, abba, abba) and they would come to you. you would know of their arrival simply by listening to your radio. something wierd did happen.

in 1977, the cia told the music group that if in fact they were as legitimate as others had claimed, then produce an alien spacecraft. thirty days later, a fully functional, fully equipped spacecraft landed in west virginia. there was no one aboard. the local residents called it in to cia headquarters, langly virginia. my unlce was a command sergeant major in the air force, stationed at hampton's air force base. the time was about 03:30-04:30 hhrs when he recieved the called. i was visiting in virginia with him and my causins when my uncle awakened me and asked if i wanted to see a real spaceship. i asked him if we were going to the sight? he said no; we were going to the hanger where they were going to keep it. the craft came in not at hampton's air force base but hampton's army post. it was brought in peacies on flat bed trucks. i ask one of the drivers where is it and what was he carrying? he said it was the spacecraft brought in parts. later, i was taken to hanger 18 of some area on hampton's army post. there, a crew began assembling the craft. another crew began testing the craft's computor parts, eletronics, et cetera. before i left, it looked like it could be a spaceship.

i believe later that summer (or perhaps during the christmas holidays), my uncle brought me back to hanger 18, and took me on a few trips with him to langly. the craft looked something like the starship voyager (at least the saucer section). his unit was assign to langly virginia as computor programmers, hackers, et cetera. the cia would call for them whenever they could not figer out how to operate any of the spaceship's computer components. less than a year later, the air force put out a moive called "hanger 8" to throw off people. the moive was a fake, all with the exception of one scene. 

i have also learned that if you really would like to get to the bottom of all this ufo crap, all you need to do is ask your friendly local australian aborigine. they calim to decend from aliens and can show you neat things. they have convinced me. 

there is a lot more to this story (e.G., abba's, oracles, voo doo priestesses, and even communism, as indicated in the moive "close encounters," the first series). apparently, it is all the same thing -- so called gifts given long ago from aliens, most of which i now believe.

if you really would like to know more, you can call me at home. if not, then stop this fraudulent claim of ufo interest groups and alien hunters... please!

an african american tale 

brian
content.summary: This description is a series of stories that interconnect.

content.detailedDescription: Every night me and my sons got out side to watch the sky. one night we started noticing lights racing across the sky but we knew they werent sattelites becasuse they would always return to there original positions and sit still.On several occasions we have noticed several getting together or grouping up and then star an eratic dance. i spot them fairly easy but it seems to be more of a grid network like there searching for something because there all over the sky not just in one location. i thought i was crazy there for a minute but i have friends and family that also sees them. but last night was the most i have seen at a time there were about ten to twenty and at one point there three really large orange orbs flying in a v sahaped formation at a high rate of speed. the lights don't appear to be in our atmosphere there simpily to high in the sky. but every night i lok for the big dipper and then turn to where it is to the back left of me and look up and thats usually the area that they originate from but recently they are just everywhere. it seems to start around 9pm cst through 4am cst. i was also noticing every now and then a red cone of light would explode out of them ( orb--<<<< ) it would last just a couple of seconds then dissapate. we also noticed a large orb hovering with sevral lights in the westeren sky.
content.summary: They appear like stars and sit still for a while then they move in erratic fashions.

content.detailedDescription: First, it sounded like a jet . then i saw it. then,i saw the alien. it looked like the one from sighns
content.summary: A close enconter of the 1st and 3rd kind.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this same amber/orangish light on 5 occasions. the first two times, i thought it was a star or planet because it would appear in the same area in the sky. on the fourth occasion (about two days before the event i am now recording) i saw it in the sky and stopped my car because it looked like it got brighter, i watched it then start moving across the sky, it flew over head of me and a friend while in the car, but it was very far away so we could not make out any sounds. and by the time we got out of the treeline (about 15 seconds) it was already across the valley and out of sight (it was not heading toward hazleton airport) after this event i was sure it was not a star or planet since there is no celestial body i know which would move or leave its station in the sky. on the fourth occasion (this one) i watched it with two friends, it was over the mountain where berwick power plant is, but i believe because it was far away that is where i was able to see it. after about an hour and a half of moving around in the same general area slowly, it started dissapearing behind the mountain. an hour after it disapeared i watch an amber/orangish sphere (same color as all of the other times) appear, it seemed to drop out of the clouds but that night was fairly clear, it flew across the sky, we watched until we couldnt see it any longer. i am sure i will probably see it again, as i have seen it on other occasions too.
content.summary: It was hovering over the mountain, dipping above and below the mountainline.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were on our way to pick up his girlfriend at dunkin' donuts in temple pa. while approaching a red light we notice the object in the sky, that was larger than a star. seconds later, two bright flashes of light came out from both sides of the object. then it took off forward and was gone in about 2 seconds. we both had the exact same reaction, asking each other, "did you see that, oh my god did you see that?" at first it was very exciting, it was unsettling until the next day. if i can be of any other assistance, please feel free to contact me. thanks for listening.
content.summary: Object in sky resembling a reflector.

content.detailedDescription:
A las 06:14 min de lunes 28 de junio  de 2010 , se observo y registro , la actividad anormal de descargas lumincas anomalas (ufo flash), que
comenzaron a verse como grandes destellos ,sobre el cielo
norte de la cap fed , casi en la vertical del "aeroparque"
metropolitano de la ciudad , sobre el cielo se la vio(descarga) en la zona
de pegasus , proxima a la estrella markab de 2.6 mag , para
luego de unos momentos ,comenzar una seguidilla de descargas mas
,he ���r como en ascenso , y con arrumbamiento hacia el sur con desplazamiento anomalo  ,cuando ya estubo un poco mas alta , paso a pocos grados de jupiter que a esa hora se halla casi en el cenit del cielo de la capital de
argentina .

equipment sony trv 310 in night shot ., not date cam ,for problem on port fire ware
http://groups.Google.Com/group/glaucoart

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Abnormalities of ufo lights in the sky of buenos aires.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself were out on the patio smoking when i looked up and noticed a light flying.  i have seen some strange things before in the skies.  this was really different.  it was as if it was flying downward and when it got closer to breaking into our atmosphere.  it started to get brighter and larger as if it was heading down in our direction.  then it flashed and flew upwards until it flew out of sight in an slanted upwards direction.
content.summary: Light flying and flashes and then flies up out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
We stopped outside of south fulton, ny for a nature call.

crystal clear night with many stars.
i looked up and saw a large orange cigar shaped object moving slowly from the north
 
it stopped and a piece of the same color fell from it.

we watched the piece fall and al of a sudden it bursts into flames,
the object then moved slowly off into the same direction it came from.


**** i wish one of your speakers would ask the critics: if the air force wanted to "prove" to the public the the roswell object was a weather ballon, why didn't they show the inflatable part of the ballon to prove it?
content.summary: Orange cigar shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting started right before the sun started to go down. i was at summer lake hot springs for a concert. this place provides a view of at least 15 miles of surrounding area for approx. 270 degrees. these ufo's were spotted above summer lake. at first: i noticed what looked like a streak of light across a large part of the sky. something had gone by at high speed at the edge of my vision. i kept my attention on that part of the sky. within a minute i saw it again, but this time it was more visible (brighter / slower movement). i ran to the tent and grabbed my camera. i witnessed what looked like balls of light moving in groups. these lights were a golden color and could be seen changing at a high rate between red,green,blue,and white. they faded in and out, as if they were disappearing and reappearing. some of the time they would stay in a semi-transparent state. i took pictures of the area whenever i saw them. much of the time they were moving so fast that i wasn't sure if i caught them. *** later in the evening multiple balls of light appeared above the horizon. they seemed to be a few miles away. after taking a few pictures, they disappeared. moments later they were spotted by my friend. they were within a mile or less and where moving extremely low to the ground. my friend and i then witnessed the lights go into the lake and disappear. the lights then reappeared and were within what seemed to be about 1000 yards of us. the dark pictures are of these lights when they were what seemed to be a few miles away. the lights then disappeared back into the lake. they were seen moving at a high rate of speed and then disappeared. that was the last we witness of them. the original images can be found here: [link moved to "additional evidence section - tg]
content.summary: Color and shape changing. moved extremely fast. remained semi-transparent for short periods of time.
